properties.headline: Low Water Advisory issued January 4 at 7:03AM EST until January 5 at 12:00PM EST by NWS Newport/Morehead City NC
properties.description:
...STRONG GUSTY WINDS AND HAZARDOUS SEAS EXPECTED TO CONTINUE
THROUGH THE WEEKEND... ...LOW WATER CONDITIONS EXPECTED EARLY
SUNDAY MORNING ON TIDAL RIVERS...

.A strong cold front will approach the region tonight and pass
through Saturday. Southwest winds will increase to 20 to 30 knots
this evening over the coastal waters, becoming west to northwest
and increasing to 30 to 40 knots behind the front Saturday night
into Sunday morning.

* WHAT...For the Small Craft Advisory, west winds 15 to 25 kt
with gusts up to 35 kt and very rough waters. For the Low
Water Advisory, abnormally low water levels expected.

* WHERE...Neuse and Bay Rivers.

* WHEN...For the Small Craft Advisory, until noon EST Sunday.
For the Low Water Advisory, from 10 PM this evening to noon
EST Sunday.

* IMPACTS...Conditions will be hazardous to small craft. Below
normal water levels will result in hazardous navigating
conditions.
properties.instruction:
Inexperienced mariners, especially those operating smaller
vessels, should avoid navigating in hazardous conditions.

Mariners should navigate shallow waters with extreme caution due
to below normal water levels.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON EST SUNDAY... ...LOW WATER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 10 PM THIS EVENING TO NOON EST SUNDAY
